TEAMS_SETTINGS.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Teams

Organizing agents into teams let you use chatwoot the way your company is structured or to segment the agents by their responsibilities.
With Chatwoot you can create multiple teams and can have any number of agents, also a user can be part of multiple teams.
You can assign conversations in chatwoot to a team so that it becomes a shared responsibility.

LIST.404: There are no teams attached to this account.

CREATE.TITLE: Create a new team
CREATE.DESC: Add a title and description to your new team.

WIZARD.title: Create
WIZARD.body: Create a new team of agents.

WIZARD.title: Add Agents
WIZARD.body: Add agents to the created team.

WIZARD.title: Finish
WIZARD.body: You are all set to go!

EDIT_FLOW.title: Edit team details
EDIT_FLOW.body: Change name, description and other details.

EDIT_FLOW.title: Voila!
EDIT_FLOW.body: You are all set to go!

ADD.TITLE: Add agents to team - %{teamName}
ADD.DESC: Add Agents to your newly created team. Only the added agents will have permissions to view conversations assigned to this team.

EDIT.TITLE: Add agents to team - %{teamName}
EDIT.DESC: Add Agents to your newly created inbox. All the added agents will be notified when a conversation is assigned to this team.

FINISH.TITLE: Your Team is ready!
FINISH.MESSAGE: You can now engage with your customers through your new Channel. Happy supporting

AUTO_ASSIGN.LABEL: Allow auto assign for this team.
